name: Killer in the Mirror
description:
A game made with @ivanfmoraes for the GMTK Game Jam - 2019.

It's mostly imcomplete... Unfortunately, I don't really have time to update it right now so the fate of this game looks grim...

Anyway, it's a puzzle game where you have one shot on each level to kill all the enemies, and you have to stealthly adjust mirrors so that your shot can get them all.
